item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @heatrn11 heatrn11
item.description:
@heatrn11 wrote:

[quote=“ravekitty, post:1, topic:440916”]
Well im making a quest, and i want the npcs to stop doing animations after the quest is finished
but it’s telling me it can’t find the symbols…
Here’s what im doing[code]
if (npcs[i].npcType == 3838 && c.freak < 6){
if (Misc.random(10) <=1) {

                                                                            npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                                                    npcs[i].forceAnim(2048);
                                                            npcs[i].forceChat("Help!");
      
                                    }
                                                             }else
                                                             if (c.freak == 6) {
                           }

[/code]

Here’s the error

[code]
src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1979: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler
if (npcs[i].npcType
== 3838 && c.freak < 6){

       ^

src\server\model\npcs\NPCHandler.java:1988: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable c
location: class server.model.npcs.NPCHandler
if (c.freak ==
6) {
^
Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations.
Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details.
2 errors
Press any key to continue . . .
[/code][/quote]
The symbols aren’t located in NPCHandler.java,

What base is this Delta?

Read full topic
